title: Givaudan Flavors Corporation Recalls Beef Tallow Products Produced Without Benefit of Import Inspection
summary: WASHINGTON, August 17, 2015 Givaudan Flavors Corporation, a Florence, Ky., establishment, is recalling approximately 3,950 pounds of beef tallow products produced in Australia that were not presented at the U.S. point of entry for inspection, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service...
